pkgmetadata.longdescription: Precision Medicine // A doubly robust precision medicine approach to fit, cross-validate and visualize prediction models for the conditional average treatment effect (CATE). It implements doubly robust estimation and semiparametric modeling approach of treatment-covariate interactions as proposed by Yadlowsky et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1772080.
